# both

**Type Property**

A constant that represents both ears.

## Declaration

```swift
static var both: UIAccessibility.HearingDeviceEar { get }
```

## Constants

- **left**: A constant that represents the left ear.
- **right**: A constant that represents the right ear.

items.description: A constant that represents the left ear.
items.name: left

items.description: A constant that represents the right ear.
